title: Bloomberg Markets: FundX's Brown on Sustainable Investing
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: FundX's Brown on Sustainable Investing
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Janet Brown President FundX Investment Group Discussing investing in funds with strong recent returns plus strong environmental, social and governance (ESG) ratings.
